long_description: The trusty Sierra Designs Storm Poncho is like the poncho from your childhood, but perfected with the latest materials and handy features like an adjustable hood and zippered storage bag. Coated nylon fabric and fully taped PVC-free seams keep moisture out. 7 in. neck opening has a rip-and-stick closure; adjustable hood helps you keep wind and rain from getting in. Includes snaps along the sides so you can adjust the fit. Size 3 (S/M) measures 73 x 46.5 in.; size 5 L/XL) measures 85 x 54.5 in. The Sierra Designs Storm Poncho comes with a zippered storage bag. Closeout.
short_description: The trusty Sierra Designs Storm Poncho is like the poncho from your childhood, but perfected with the latest materials and handy features like an adjustable hood and zippered storage bag.
